pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========Overview========Python utility to monitor metadata KPI* Free software: MIT licenseInstallation============:: pip install datamonitorYou can also install the in-development version with:: pip install https://github.com/infra-helpers/induction-monitoring/archive/master.zipDocumentation=============https://datamonitoring.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Development===========To run the all tests run:: toxNote, to combine the coverage data from all the tox environments run:.. list-table:: :widths: 10 90 :stub-columns: 1 - - Windows - :: set PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append tox - - Other - :: PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append toxChangelog=========0.0.0 (2020-07-01)------------------* First release on PyPI.
